channel.title: Open Source Jobs - Updates
channel.description: Latest job opportunities from open source projects

item.title: Merge b9f594742e933fe483ec9ee21b93fa7c15913df4 into 0df8a448c0e95ed4e87b95e00ef432039ca84b22
item.description:
Added 1 repository:

  • open62541/open62541 by o6 Automation GmbH
    Open source implementation of OPC UA (OPC Unified Architecture / IEC 62541) written in C. Platform independent with exchangeable plugins for easy porting to different embedded targets.
    Apply for job

item.title: Add maximhq/bifrost
